channel.title: etc on this is bad art
channel.description: Recent content in etc on this is bad art

item.description: Now when I think of making something new I also think about having to preserve it. Might as well get it saved away ahead of time so you don’t have to yank its guts out of another wayback scrape. It adds an extra weight to whatever I start, which is a hindrance. What is worth keeping? What is okay to throw away? Despite a year and a half of ferreting around, I haven’t come to any answer at all.
